name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a Chinese student found several books about ancient China in a British library. In response, many netizens accused the West of plagiarizing Chinese technology and said that without the Yongle Encyclopedia, there would be no Renaissance, gravity, and steam engines in the West. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888257777526874112/pu/img/n3UswWhwt1ANXNId.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: February 7 (Released) Anhui. A pair of siblings said in front of the camera: their father was stabbed by a mentally ill person and was in critical condition. The other party has not come forward to compensate them. Since they come from a rural family and are poor, they cannot afford the huge medical expenses. They beg the relevant departments and leaders to pay attention. https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888264440749133825/pu/img/z7jXCHcseENAZSv8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Recently, in Yichang, Hubei, the Kuomintang emblem on the entrance gate of Shipai Village was removed.
Public information shows that the Shipai Anti-Japanese War Site is located in Shipai Village, Sanduping Town, Yichang City, 17 kilometers away from the city. Shipai is named because of the huge rock on its peak that stands like a sign. https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjR6_IVbEAA5lXZ.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On February 8, Chen Xiaopeng, former Party Secretary and Director of the Shenzhen Securities Regulatory Bureau, was expelled from the Party: He seriously damaged the image of securities supervision and seriously polluted the ecology of the capital market..... https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjSad7zbwAAHZX7.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Contribution from a student of Chenzhou No. 2 Middle School
The "arms race" of study time has become the norm in Chenzhou, a fourth-tier city. I woke up at 6 a.m., went out to face the cold wind close to 0 degrees Celsius, caught the first bus, sat in my seat and closed my eyes to make up for the lack of sleep. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 8, Jiangsu. At the dinner table, the father said that Japan was good, and was accused by his daughter: "You are Chinese, you should always remember the heinous crimes committed by the Japanese in China"
The father replied: "That's it, our car is still a Japanese car, and there are Japanese parts in your phone"
The daughter said, then smash it, why don't you buy a domestic Hongqi car? https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888456046043336704/pu/img/x8Y5kKrTvtIdfi49.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
February 8 (Release) Traffic police fined a driver at a highway service station, but when he drove away, he was not wearing a seat belt.
February 8, Hebei. Traffic police issued a ticket and drove away without wearing a seat belt. (The video has been deleted)
February 8, Anhui. Netizens filmed the urban management law enforcement vehicle running a red light. (The video has been deleted) https://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1888510082310389760/pu/img/e1ZdfS3appxrFXN-.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The Paper: Kindergarten principal sells alcohol on livestream to save herself after 20 million yuan in debt
Amid the "kindergarten closure wave", 8 of the 12 kindergartens of an education group in Guiyang have closed. Founder Jing Yazhen said that the huge debt owed by the company has made "being harassed" a daily routine. In order to maintain operations, she tried to "save herself" by selling alcohol on livestream. https://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1888512406361632768/img/jYxJnuXHWq7i1Az8.jpg

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: "Positive energy blogger" Mao Xinghuo wrote about the "Shanxi Urban Management picking locks and turning on lights" incident: "Is it so difficult for businesses to cooperate and turn on lights during the Chinese New Year? It's just picking locks and turning on lights, but it's like robbery and arson. Western selfish individualistic bad values are corroding our society, and this is also the result of cultural invasion" https://pbs.twimg.com/media/GjVaZhaboAA23bL.jpg
